meanings: repay (sb for sth) [명사] reward (for), [동사] reward (sb for/with sth),
repay what one owes to one´s country

vlive.korean: 열심히 하는 것만이 보답하는 길이라고 생각합니다 파이팅! I believe working hard is the way to pay back the love. Fighting! 듣기 View video SMTOWN : SUPER JUNIOR THE STAGE Behind The Scene
vlive.english: I believe working hard is the way to pay back the love. Fighting!

vlive.korean: 보답 맞나? Is that right? 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍧
그러면 보답으로 저희도 하트를 한번 보내드릴까요? Shall we send hearts in return? 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : 🌏 와클와클 8인실 왔다! 하트 광클 🌏
vlive.english: Shall we send hearts in return?

vlive.korean: 내 친구들이 보답을 좀 해줘 그렇죠? My friends, please do something in return. Right? 듣기 View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : [커먼스쿨]서울여자상업고등학교 ep5.(홍현희X정세운X강율)
vlive.english: My friends, please do something in return. Right?

vlive.korean: 반겨주신 만큼 좋은 무대로 보답하고 싶습니다! As much as you've welcomed us, we'll return the love with our performance! 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : IZ*ONE 에너지 캠(ENOZI Cam) EP.42
vlive.english: As much as you've welcomed us, we'll return the love with our performance!

examples.korean: Their trust was repaid with fierce loyalty. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들의 신뢰는 열렬한 충성으로 보답을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their trust was repaid with fierce loyalty. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: How can I ever repay you for your generosity? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신의 아량에 제가 어떻게 보답할 수 있을까요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: How can I ever repay you for your generosity? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I can never repay your many kindnesses to me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 제게 베푼 많은 친절에 제가 결코 보답할 수 없을 거예요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I can never repay your many kindnesses to me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Can I buy you lunch in return for your help? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 날 도와준 데 대한 보답으로 내가 점심 살까? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can I buy you lunch in return for your help? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s time we returned their invitation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 그들의 초대에 보답을 해야 할 때이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s time we returned their invitation. Add to Wordbook
